name: Lisbeth Blanket
description: Do you like my work and want to get
full_text: Do you like my work and want to get more information? You can follow my design process on my Patreon page or sign up for my test knit newsletter. The Lisbeth Blanket is an elegant and timeless piece with a moss stitch edge. The texture of the blanket is created by a simple cross stitch pattern. The pattern describes one size but you can easily adjust the width and length of your blanket. FINISHED MEASUREMENTS Width: 23.6“ / 59 cm Length: 30“ / 75 cm MATERIALS YARN Smart by Sandnes Garn (100% wool, 50 g - 110 yds/100 m), colorway natural melert (2641) - 350 grams. NEEDLES US 5/3.75 mm circular needles. NOTIONS 2 removable stitch markers, cable needle (optional), tapestry needle, scissors. GAUGE 22 sts x 34 rnds to 4"/10 cm on US 5/3.75 mm needles in cross stitch stitch, after blocking. Lisbeth is an elegant and timeless baby blanket with a pearl stitch border. The texture of the blanket results from a simple cross pattern. The instructions describe one size, but contain instructions on how the size can be adjusted as desired. DIMENSIONS Width: 59 cm Length: 75 cm MATERIAL YARN Smart from Sandnes Garn (100% wool, 50 g - 100 m), color natural heather (2641) - 350 g. NEEDLES 3.75 mm circular knitting needles ACCESSORIES 2 stitch markers, cable needle (optional), stitch sample 22 sts x 34 rows for 10 x 10 cm with 3.75 mm Cross pattern, after washing and stretching.
